svg.title: Sequence Diagram: US05 - Build a Station (Split)

g.text: Sequence Diagram: US05 - Build a Station (Split)
loads and displays the selected map
requests location (Position) on map for the station
requests center point selection (NE, SE, NW, SW)
proposes station name based on closest city
displays station cost and economic radius
shows preview of station placement and requests confirmation
updates map with the new station
